document_data.name: Roi Uxio
document_data.mainbody: '''Roi Uxio''' was a soldier of the [[Red Plumes]] in [[Yûlash]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Death on the Wall|14}}
document_data.Activities: Roi was stationed at the Red Plumes camp in Yûlash. A [[silkroot]] addict, he often went to a secluded spot to indulge in his vice.
document_data.History:
Roi bought the silkroot from a man named [[Ventria Greenglass]] of [[Hillsfar]]'s [[Rogues' Guild]].

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], during the visit of [[Torin Nomerthal]] to the city, Roi was worried he would have only one dose of silkroot left.
document_data.Personality: Roi was a coward at heart. He was scared that his superiors would discover his vice and severely punish him.
